text: Mucho Barato is the first album by Control Machete, a Mexican hip hop group. It came out in 1997 and sold 100,000 copies in Mexico, and 400,000 in Latin America. The single Comprendes Mendes? became very popular and was a radio hit all over Latin America. == List of songs == # "Control Machete" # "Comprendes Mendes?" # "Las Fabulosas I" # "Andamos Armados" # "Humanos Mexicanos" # "Cheve" # "Madrugada Encore" # "Asi Son Mis Dias" # "Te Aprovechas del Limite?" # "Justo 'N" # "La Copa de Dama" # "Lupita" # "Grin-Gosano" # "Ãšnete Pueblo" # "Las Fabulosas II" # "El Son Divo" # "Marioneta" # "Mexican Curious" (Bonus track) Category:1997 albums
title: Mucho Barato
